Literature.Title: Semi-synthetic puwainaphycin/minutissamide cyclic lipopeptides with improved antifungal activity and limited cytotoxicity.
Literature.Author: Hájek J, Bieringer S, Voráčová K, Macho M, Saurav K, Delawská K, Divoká P, Fišer R, Mikušová G, Cheel J, Fewer DP, Vu DL, Paichlová J, Riepl H, Hrouzek P

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aspergillus fumigatus BCC020_2845(MIC=0.5µM),Fusarium oxysporum BCC020_2866(no activity data),Trichoderma harzianum BCC020_0606(MIC=15µM),Alternaria alternata BCC020_0609(MIC=0.5µM),Bipolaris sorokiniana BCC020_1571(no activity data),Plectosphaerella cucumerina BCC020_2872(MIC=7.5µM),Chaetomium globosum BCC020_2527(MIC=60µM),Candida friedrichii BCC020_2879(MIC=7.5µM),Human cervical carcinoma HeLa(IC50=20µM)
